name: De'troid
description:
Contrary to metroid, the more you play, the more you lose your skills.

Get out of the planet you crash-landed on.

credit

Sprite - https://www.kenney.nl/

Music - https://tsuyomiblog.com/free-bgm

Font - https://neodgm.dalgona.dev/

with reserved font name "Neo둥근모 Pro" and "NeoDunggeunmo Pro".
